testsuite.name: Create User API Test

testcase.name: When register a user without Admin type, then user should not be created
When register a user with null email, then user should not be created
When register a user, then user should be saved with success
When register a user with a Invalid Admin type, then user should not be created
When register a user with null name, then user should not be created
When register a user with a existent email, then user should not be created
When register a user with a empty email, then user should not be created
When register a Admin user, then user should be saved with success
When register a user without password, then user should not be created
When register a user with a empty name, then user should not be created
When register a user with null password, then user should not be created
